name: GO Ghost
description:
WASD to move, hold left shift to run, H to wave and ESC to pause! Move the mouse to look around you!

Avoid the ghosts at all costs!

Get to the end of each level as fast as possible!

Only so much stamina! Use it wisely to escape!

                                                                                                                             

Team members

  • Céline Ly - Game Designer 
  • Helena Ton-That - Graphics Designer
  • Oliver Jean - Sound Designer
